seconds.translation[0].definitions[0].de: another serving of food, after you have eaten your first serving
seconds.translation[0].definitions[1].de: clothes or other goods that are cheaper than usual because they are not perfect
seconds.translation[1].definitions[0].de: goods that are sold cheaply because they are damaged or not of the usual quality
seconds.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Visit the factory shop, and look out for cheap seconds of all leather goods.
